title: United Nations Secretariat to the High Level Panel on System-wide Coherence

quotes: Benjamin W. Mkapa, a seasoned journalist, diplomat and politician, was President of Tanzania from 1995 to 2005.
From 1974 to 1976, he served as Press Secretary to the President of Tanzania,
and in 1976, was the Founding Editor of the Tanzania News Agency.
From 1980 to 1982, he was the Minister of Information and Culture,
and ten years later, the Minister of Information and Broadcasting.
He served as the Minister of Foreign Affairs from 1977 to 1980, and again in 1984.
In the 1980âs, he served as High Commissioner to Canada then as Ambassador to the US.
In 1992, he served as Minister of Science, Technology and Higher Education.
In 2002, President Mkapa was appointed Co-Chair of the World Commission on the Social Dimension of Globalization.
His book, Truth and Transparency: The Peopleâs President Talks to the People was published in 2003.

active in conflict prevention and resolution in the Great Lakes Region of Africa,
